general_advisory: Farmers are advised not to burn the residue of Kharif crops in the fields because it not only pollute the environment but also cause severe health problems. Keep harvested matured paddy crops in a safer place & if possible dry under the sun. Drain out excess water from the crop & vegetable field. Clean the animal shed by spraying disinfectant/bleaching powder/phenyl.

advisory: Rice grains must be dried under the sun for 3-4 days to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% moisture for seed purpose.
Transfer the already harvested paddy from the field to go down/any shade place.
Make the threshing floor and storage godown clean and spray Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9CS@ 1.5ml/li of water to minimize the chance of future infestation of storage pest.
Thinning should be carried out before top dressing to maintain optimum plant population.
Monitor the activity of Aphid, Tobacco caterpillar & incidence of alternaria leaf spot disease in mustard.
After the cessation of rain, spraying of Rhidomil M-Z @2g/li of water to prevent the spread of collar rot & early leaf blight disease in groundnut.
Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus.
Alternate spraying of Neem oil formulation 1500ppm @3ml/lit of water and spray flonicamid 50WG @0.3g/lit to control whitefly.
Keep the animal inside the shed.
Clean the animal shed by spraying disinfectant/bleaching powder/phenyl.
